channel.title: Problem with certain locations making game crash
channel.description:
I have a small problem: on the downloadable MoparScape client, when I go far enough into the elf lands, or to the far east of Falador, the game disconnects me, freezes, and I have to restart the client. Does anyone know how to fix this problem? If it helps, I'm using a Mac, but my friend who uses Windows Vista also has this problem.
I apologize if this has already been answered.

item.title: Problem with certain locations making game crash
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

if you have the same client. then its server sided

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with certain locations making game crash

item.title: Problem with certain locations making game crash
item.dc:creator: @i_have_an_ax i have an ax
item.description:
@i_have_an_ax wrote:

Thanks for the info. The strange thing is, my other friend told me the elf lands work for him, and he has the same client.

Anyway, thanks for the help.

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with certain locations making game crash

item.title: Problem with certain locations making game crash
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

the reason why this happens is because those parts of the map might not be added to either the client or server. try getting a player-made client. but thats all i’d really know

Read full topic
